scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:server & pnpm run dev:web
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @agentboard/shared build && pnpm --filter @agentboard/web build && pwd && ls -la packages/web/ && cp -r packages/web/dist ./dist
scripts.build:all: pnpm --filter @agentboard/shared build && pnpm --filter @agentboard/server build && pnpm --filter @agentboard/web build
